tweets.text: I am hearing that @EnvAgency @ClintonDevon @NESouthWest may have finally seen sense!? @ChrisGPackham @Natures_Voice @DevonWildlife https://t.co/fAB6uuBlCW

@WiseBirding @EnvAgency @ClintonDevon @NESouthWest @ChrisGPackham @Natures_Voice @DevonWildlife There is no 'soft way' to remove scrub during the bird breeding season, whilst this halt is ok, the only fully acceptable outcome is no work until August, any other options take us back to the same legal position. Watch this carefully.

(1) Today is my last day at the @YorkDalesRT 
It's been an amazing 3 & a bit years working with an amazing team on some fantastic projects. I am so grateful for all the opportunities I've been given, & the friends I've made on the job. The @theriverstrust family is amazing! https://t.co/Zsuncm6Ksg
Sewage fungus can be found on the beds of polluted rivers, or in drain outlets – in this case, it’s possible to trace pollution back to its source. (2/3) https://t.co/YHoFKejWbs

@chris_railway @ChrisGPackham @EnvAgency @ClintonDevon @kiergroup @NESouthWest @WiseBirding He can’t help dragging his pathological hatred of #hs2 into anything he says, no matter how much @nigelsarbutts tries to dress it up.

Thank you @MattHancock for supporting my campaign, and the people of #NewcastleUnderLyme, by writing to the @EnvAgency.

As Matt says, it is imperative that the Environment Agency exercise the full range of their regulatory and enforcement powers over the company. https://t.co/lH1na7Cr8A

tweets.text: .@thameswater have a new online tool you can use to report sewage blockages. We encourage you to report signs of pollution in or out of the river e.g. surcharging manholes, sanitary waste near manholes etc, to help prevent further pollution issues 👉 https://t.co/wIn99s0xWt

urls.title: Report a blockage
urls.description: Report a blockage with our quick and easy-to-use online form and we'll aim to get an engineer there as soon as possible.

They were temporarily closed to allow work to be undertaken by the @EnvAgency https://t.co/NULc5qGVUO

urls.title: Petition: Review the Regulation of Odour Management of Landfill Sites
urls.description: We call for the Government to review how the Environment Agency monitors and manages levels of malodourous gasses. Consideration should be given to compulsory monitoring of emissions of landfill sites and for the EA to be obliged to act with urgency when high levels of odour complaints are received.

tweets.text: @SianieRoo @HelenVi00175623 @EnvAgency @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA @DefraGovUK I've just vomited in the kitchen. I've had an increase in headaches, migraines, and sleep deprivation, but I've never vomited because of the odour before 😔 What a way to start the work day 👍 Positive news can't come soon enough.

tweets.text: @ChrisGPackham @EnvAgency @ClintonDevon @kiergroup @NESouthWest @WiseBirding Happy birthday @ChrisGPackham — you will forever be one of my true UK heroes for standing up to HS2!

On 4th March 2020 the First-teir Tribunal overruled a decision by EA & ICO not to provide Robert Latimer with data regarding the Whitburn sewage overflow.

1 year, 1 month & 26 days later he has still not received that information.

Why is that @EnvAgency, @ICOnews? https://t.co/wO5G8OTvfh

@BattmanMichael @ChrisGPackham @EnvAgency @ClintonDevon @kiergroup @NESouthWest @WiseBirding Why has he, I used to live in the Midlands very very close to the HS2 and I have personally seen the destruction that is causing, wildlife and people being torn from their homes and they have no say what so ever

@poppers82 @StinkStopthe @sunnyraisin62 @scottdegg @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 @ClareDinnisEA Except this time the PR excercise is now a PR disaster . No sympathy with her , or @EnvAgencyMids / @EnvAgency . Toothless and spineless !
@chris_railway @ChrisGPackham @EnvAgency @ClintonDevon @kiergroup @NESouthWest @WiseBirding Chris, the anti-HS2 zealots won't listen. Their messiah has spoken.

Unfortunately @PHE_uk and @EnvAgency not interested in women’s health if you’re from #newcastleunderlyme Pregnant women suffering, women in labour giving birth whilst being poisoned by noxious gas from #whalleysquarry #StopTheStink #TalkWomensHealth
